metadata.name: Crystalline Light Body Activation I
metadata.description:
Through focused alchemical meditation, & balanced ascetic purification, the spectral spheres of perception may be harmonised & the Unified Energy Field traversed. With the Chakra vortexes aligned & the 'Sacred Medicineâ€™ (awoken & refined Kundalini) harnessed & channeled to Sahasrara, the profound Living Light Lattice of 'Astral Coral' is unveiled & the Crystalline Light Body emanation actualised.

Edition: 1/1, 2k, 1min AV seamless loop.
Collector will receive an exclusive uncompressed 4k version.
